text: The Brattsund Bridge () is a cantilever bridge in the municipality of Meløy in Nordland county, Norway. It is part of the bridge connection between the islands of Åmøya and Grønøya, several small islands, and the mainland village of Engavågen. The bridge is long, and the main span is . The bridge was constructed out of pre-stressed concrete.. title: Brattsund Bridge
